label: cascading_failure_01_dx_auth_audit_002
content:

### Deployments & Changes
- Renewed expired SP certificate for legacy HR app; coordinated with app owner.
- Updated JWKS cache warmup on audit workers to reduce token rotation failures.

### Events
- Ran automated evidence collection for SOC2 CC6: captured MFA enforcement settings and admin group membership snapshots.
- User-reported SAML error for legacy HR app; traced to expired SP certificate and coordinated renewal with app owner.
- Completed cleanup of stale service accounts: revoked 12 roles not used in 180 days.
- Reduced token rotation failures by updating JWKS cache warmup on audit workers.

### On-Call
- Shift: M. Alvarez. 1 page. 9 tickets. Status: Stable; one app certificate issue resolved and documented.
